name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Data Engineer with 9+ years of experience in data modeling, schema design, and ETL/ELT processes. Proficient in databases such as **SQL**, **PostgreSQL**, **ClickHouse**, and **Snowflake**, with a strong background in data pipeline orchestration using **Apache Airflow**, **dbt**, and **Airbyte**. Skilled in data visualization tools, including **Power BI** and **Looker**, enabling effective insights and decision-making. Demonstrated ability to optimize data workflows and enhance system performance while collaborating with cross-functional teams. Additionally experienced as a .NET Full Stack Developer, bringing expertise in modern frameworks such as **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, **.NET**, and **C#**.

experience.responsibilities:
Executed comprehensive **ETL** processes using **Apache Airflow**, ensuring data integrity and transformation across multiple systems.
Developed and optimized **SQL** queries in **PostgreSQL** and **ClickHouse** to enhance data retrieval, achieving an execution time reduction of **30%**.
Designed data models and optimized schema design for scalable data architecture, improving data accessibility by **20%**.
Implemented data integration workflows using **Airbyte**, facilitating seamless data ingestion from various sources.
Spearheaded data analytics initiatives by leveraging **Power BI** and **Looker** for impactful data visualizations, resulting in actionable insights and decision-making agility.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to refine data pipelines and ensure alignment of data strategy with business objectives.
Created and documented data pipelines following best practices in **ELT**, ensuring maintainability and performance.
Utilized **dbt** for transformation processes, enhancing data quality and consistency across the ecosystem.
Conducted performance tuning on existing databases, improving query performance by **25%**.
Maintained compliance with data governance policies while ensuring data security and privacy standards.

Utilized **SQL** and **PostgreSQL** to design and optimize data models and schema design, improving data retrieval times by **20%**.
Implemented ETL and ELT processes using **Apache Airflow**, facilitating seamless data integration and transformation workflows.
Designed data pipelines with **dbt** for data modeling, leading to a **30%** reduction in data processing times.
Integrated data sources using **Airbyte**, streamlining data ingestion workflows and enhancing overall efficiency.
Created interactive dashboards and reporting tools using **Power BI** and **Looker**, providing stakeholders with real-time insights and improving decision-making speed.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, ensuring alignment with business goals and enhancing project delivery timelines by **15%**.
Conducted data quality checks and implemented robust data governance practices, increasing data accuracy and reliability.
Mentored junior data engineers, sharing expertise in **data modeling** and best practices, leading to an overall improvement in team output by **25%**.
Facilitated knowledge-sharing sessions on advanced analytics techniques, fostering a culture of continuous learning and development within the team.

• Designed and implemented **ETL** and **ELT** processes utilizing **Apache Airflow** to streamline data integration from various sources, reducing data processing time by **30%**.
• Developed efficient data models and schema designs to optimize data storage and retrieval in **PostgreSQL** and **ClickHouse**, enhancing query performance by **25%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate data pipelines and ensure seamless data flow using **Airbyte**, increasing data accuracy and accessibility.
• Created and maintained analytical dashboards in **Power BI** and **Looker**, enabling real-time data visualization and insights for stakeholders.
• Conducted data quality assessments and monitoring, improving data integrity across multiple systems.
• Contributed to the design and modernization of data architecture, including migrating existing solutions to **Snowflake**, resulting in improved scalability and reduced costs by **15%**.
• Documented data workflows and processes to facilitate knowledge sharing and onboarding of new team members.
• Participated in code reviews and team meetings to ensure adherence to best practices in data engineering and project objectives.
